sentence: That should have been a pretty big sign.? Throughout his 25-minute performance, Noah managed to lampoon a striking number of media and political figures including but not limited to Donald Trump, Jeffrey Toobin, Tucker Carlson, Laura Ingraham, Chris Cuomo, Kyrsten Sinema, Kellyanne Conway, Madison Cawthorn, Ron DeSantis, Jen Psaki, First Lady Jill Biden and of course, President Joe Biden.
author: Christi CarrasStaff Writer
title: Trevor Noah roasts pretty much everyone at White House Correspondents Dinner

sentence: Thats why Ron DeSantis is one step ahead first you ban the math textbooks, then nobody knows how to count the votes.
